LLULL | 2016 EXHIBITION POSTERS

EXHIBITION

2016 EXPLORING LLULL

The first steps into discovering the Catalan Philosopher and Visionary were exciting. After reading many articles and doing deep Internet Archeology Research I started to connect the dots of all of his theory and creating the first ideas for the exhibition.

This process led me to a pre-exhibition series of posters whcih start creating the foundation of the seminal ideas later would be exhibited.

The beauty, purity and extreme synthesis is at the heart of this first series of posters about LLULL.

The origins of thought, the importance of asking the right questions and the theory of ‘the first and second intention’ showed me the rational believe LLULL was pointing us to something more real than we thought.

Discovering LLULL

After 700 years and with finnally and thanks to the information technology LLULL can shine again.

The influence of his universal concepts and ideas can be found in many fields — literature, visual arts, music, philosophy, religion, and politics — and their effects are felt in contemporary disciplines such as information theory, informatics, and media technology.

LLULL ON BEHANCE
